snippet.title: SteamWorld Heist: Overview Trailer - Out Now!
snippet.description:
Out now on Steam, iPhone/iPad, PS4/Vita, Wii U and 3DS!

In SteamWorld Heist, you command a steam-driven pirate crew in a series of epic tactical shootouts. It’s turn-based strategy with an action twist: You manually aim the guns of your robots, allowing for insane skill shots and bullet-bouncing action!

Buy now: http://imageform.se/game/steamworld-heist/

Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/imageform
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/imageform

Soundtrack by Steam Powered Giraffe: https://www.youtube.com/spgiraffe
